Literature.Title: Interaction of mastoparan-B from venom of a hornet in Taiwan with phospholipid bilayers and its antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Park NG, Yamato Y, Lee S, Sugihara G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis LS-101(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 1840(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis PCI 219(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ JC-2(MIC=>25µg/ml),Shigella flexneri EW-10(MIC=>25µg/ml),Shigella sonnei EW-33(MIC=>25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>25µg/ml)
